div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 10px; margin-left: 695px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;

div.div: Project Phases

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 390px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;

div.div: Ideation

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 160px; margin-left: 341px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Idea is proposed to ASAM

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.div: Proposal

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Proposal for Concept project created and accepted

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 785px; margin-left: 461px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Proposal for new standard based on concept paper is created and accepted

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1570px; margin-left: 461px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Proposal for minor update is created and accepted

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 630px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Project timeline is extended due to high complexity

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1240px; margin-left: 581px;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.div: Project is developed and internally reviewed over project development timeline

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 870px; margin-left: 581px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Project kick-off, project lead elected

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1005px; margin-left: 581px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Project is developed and internally reviewed over project development timeline

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 755px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;

div.div: Review

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 580px; margin-left: 706px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Project is reviewed and feedback integrated

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1320px; margin-left: 706px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Project is reviewed and feedback integrated

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1890px; margin-left: 706px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Project is reviewed and feedback integrated

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 880px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;

div.div: Release

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 650px; margin-left: 831px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Concept paper is accepted by TSC and released

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1390px; margin-left: 831px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Standard is reviewed by TSC and released

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1960px; margin-left: 831px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Updated standard is reviewed by TSC and released

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 1000px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;

div.div: Public

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1480px; margin-left: 951px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Standard is public and outside feedback is continously gathered

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2040px; margin-left: 951px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Updated standard is public and public feedback is continously gathered

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2210px; margin-left: 951px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: rgb(156, 156, 156); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Standard has become obsolete and is retired

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 312px; height: 1px; padding-top: 206px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right; max-height: 152px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: The project starts its life as an idea.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 312px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right; max-height: 156px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: The idea is complex. To investigate it further, an initial concept project is proposed.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 312px; height: 1px; padding-top: 537px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right; max-height: 156px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: The concept is developed in a development project. The goal is to investiagte the topic enough for a follow-up project, where the actual standard is to be created.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 312px; height: 1px; padding-top: 708px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right; max-height: 154px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: The created concept paper is reviewed by ASAM. After the feedback has been integrated, the final paper is presented to and reviewed by the TSC. The TSC approves the document and the paper is released.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 312px; height: 1px; padding-top: 844px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right; max-height: 154px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: The follow-up project to create a new standard based on the concept paper is proposed. After an initial rejection rejection by the TSC, it is improved, presented again, and accepted as a new project.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 312px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1290px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right; max-height: 256px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: The proposed new standard is developed by the project participants. However, the initial timeline proves to be too short and the project is extended with the approval of the TSC. After the intended level of quality has been reached, the remaining topics are put into a feature backlog for future releases.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 312px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1438px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right; max-height: 174px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: The new standard is reviewed by ASAM members. Additionally, there is a public review with a release candidate afterwards. After the feedback from both reviews has been categorized and the prioritized feedback been integrated, the standard is presented to and reviewed by the TSC. The TSC approves the release.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 312px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1538px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right; max-height: 174px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: The standard is publicly availabe. Feedback and input are gathered and added to the backlog.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 312px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1614px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right; max-height: 156px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: An update (minor version) for the released standard is proposed and accepted as project.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 312px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1864px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right; max-height: 256px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: The proposed update for the released standard is developed by the project participants. After the intended level of quality has been reached, the remaining topics are again put into a feature backlog for future releases.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 312px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2001px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right; max-height: 174px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: The minor version update is reviewed by ASAM members. After the feedback has been categorized and the prioritized feedback been integrated, the updated standard is presented to and reviewed by the TSC. The TSC approves the release.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 312px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2118px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right; max-height: 174px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: The updated standard is publicly availabe. Feedback and input are gathered and added to the backlog.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 312px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2278px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right; max-height: 174px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: The standard has become obsolete. Therefore, ASAM retires it completely.

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
